mapper.update: update flow_payments set pdate = #{pdate,jdbcType=DATE}, pcategory = #{pcategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psource_shop = #{psourceShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptrading_amount = #{ptradingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, premainning_amount = #{premainningAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where pnumber = #{pnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pnumber, pdate, pcategory, psource_shop, ptrading_amount, premainning_amount from flow_payments
